DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see Cediranib combination FOLFOX effective treating metastatic colorectal cancer see compare Avastin ( Bevacizumab ) combination FOLFOX .
DOC.brief_title: First Line Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Therapy Combination With FOLFOX
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis colon rectal cancer No prior systemic therapy metastatic disease . Any adjuvant/neoadjuvant oxaliplatin therapy must receive > 12 month prior study entry adjuvant/neoadjuvant 5FU must receive > 6 month prior study entry . Prior treatment VEGF Inhibitor , include bevacizumab cediranib . Poorly control hypertension
